Articles.Content:
Also what train?

still my hill.

I kick you off the hill.

My hill.

I snipe you from the hill

My hill... with a body on it
Plot twist - I *am* the hill!
An earthquake happens. You *were* the hill.
Earthquakes don't generally change terrain much, but it did clean off those pesky dead bodies on my surface. I *am* the hill.

I replace all of the hill's butane with propane.

I am the ![King_of_the_hill_inrto.PNG](http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/logopedia/images/6/6a/King_of_the_hill_inrto.PNG)
The hill contained no natural gas resources.

Yes, it didn't contain natural ones.

It contained an artificial gas holder with butane, and ApertureScience tried to repace ir with propane.

Was his attempt wise? Don't know. But it definitely was bright...

Police' and firemen's hill.
Ahem, my (albeit wrecked) property is still on the hill, would appreciate it if I could have my multi thousand dollar train back...
I take the hill, cover it in a dome, protected it with a ray shield, and defended it with 100 quad-turbolaser turrets.

I use a mirror to have the lases destroy themselves, then i dig under the sheild and dome.

My hill

I add chicken powered nuclear landmines
the chickens destroy all the landmines and destroys the hill. Then I rebuild the hill. My new Hill.
Supermutants and molerats come to the radioactive hill and dig it up to reach the source of heat.

They die, I put Danny in the crater.

My red hill.

One of you...has destroyed my property! The government takes the hill as to investigate this crime!

Government's hill!

> 
> 
> On 8/12/2017 at 2:49 AM, thekspbegginer said:
> 
> 
> My red hill.
> 

nonononononononononononononoonononoononoooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo

> 
> 
> On 8/12/2017 at 4:25 AM, Spacetraindriver said:
> 
> 
> Government's hill!
> 

I pay for the land MY HILL

A meteor hits the hill and kills everything on the hill, leaving only the bacteria in the meteor.

the bacterias hill

I sterilize them.

My ominously clean meteorite.

The clean meteorite opens. Alien nano-troopers get out and occupy the hill.

E.T. occupied hill.

I kill them with I'MA FIRIN' MAH LAZOR!  BWAAAAHH

My meme.
I divide every other hill by zero and then build my own.

Infinite hills divided by zero hide your puny heap of dust.

Infinity Hills.

Spoiler

Strange, but can't google out such toponim. While a good lovecraftian name for a small fishermen village.

**Edited <time datetime="2017-08-17T04:21:17Z" title="08/17/2017 04:21  AM" data-short="6 yr">August 17, 2017</time> by kerbiloid**

I multiply the infinite hills by zero and make a new hill 

MY HILL!

I test what a Тцар бомба does to the hill

My crater
